title: Episode 16 - Miguel McKelvey, Co-founder and Chief Culture Officer of WeWork
description: In this discussion about workplace culture, Miguel McKelvey talks about the shifting perspectives of what an office should be, as well as WeWork’s ambition, expansion and valuation.
dc:creator: Bloomberg
itunes:summary: In this discussion about workplace culture, Miguel McKelvey talks about the shifting perspectives of what an office should be, as well as WeWork’s ambition, expansion and valuation.
